creator: Happy Coloring Platform
descriptionHtml:
👋Hi, if you are an extremely crazy lover for various brain teaser emoji match puzzle games or logic puzzles, here our emoji match game is your best choice! You can't miss logic puzzles anymore. Emoji Match is a popular logic puzzle game!

😍The Emoji Match puzzle game seems to be easy emoji collection, but don’t underestimate that it’s not just a collection of various emoji, it’s an extremely challenging logic puzzle game that you need to continuously exercise your brain and logic to complete it.

🧐Maybe you are puzzled about how to deal with emoji match games, here let’s tell you——The final purpose of emoji match games is to clear all emoji in the grid with the minimum steps.

🌈Specific steps are as following:
• Solve the logic puzzle! Find different pairs of various emoji to clear the emoji grid at the end.
• Eliminate the required emoji one by one and different grades you can get.
• Connect pairs of emoji only in adjacent cells of horizontal, vertical, and diagonal directions respectively.
• You can also connect pairs of emoji at the end of one row/column and the beginning of the next one.
• Add extra rows with remaining emoji when there are no suitable emoji.
• Enough hints are helpful to speed up the game progress when you are in difficulty.
• Removing all the emoji from the grid, you are the champion of emoji match games.
descriptionShort: Enjoy emoji match and logic puzzle games. Your good choice for brain training!
title: Emoji Match - Logic Puzzles

descriptionHtml:
Do not hesitate! Come and enjoy the wonderful Halloween trip!

Halloween Color, Color by Number & Paint by number is a Halloween coloring book for players of all ages. Halloween Color is an online painting app, taking you to explore the wonderful coloring world. It helps you explore daily new pics and paint by number to make your coloring book.

"On Halloween, everything's possible
On Halloween, the false is true
On Halloween, it's always a scream…."

When the familiar lyrics come over the radio, it means Halloween is coming soon!

Don't know how to celebrate Halloween this year? Let Coloring Games help you!

This app contains many paintings of Halloween themes and Halloween elements.

🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃
🎃🎃🍬🎃🎃
🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃

★★★★★★
💀 Sugar Skull
🎃 Pumpkin
🧸 Horror dolls
🤡 Clown
😈 Darkness
👻 Ghost
🧟‍♀️ Zombies
🥳 Halloween Makeup
🤯 Nightmare


Special Category.
🧛Halloween story series pictures🎬
🤖Mysterious Halloween pictures❓

The Halloween theme activity is in full swing to ensure you get the best Halloween experience in Paint Color! The Halloween activity mainly includes the paid and free picture collections, the theme photo story collection, and new daily Halloween pictures! Here, you can spend your Halloween with some "old friends" of this special day such as skeleton, ghost, witch, pumpkin, candy, face paint, costume ball, and so on.

Here is the guidance for you to enjoy Halloween in Color Games:

❓How to paint in Halloween Color?

Unlike paper painting books requiring sophisticated painting skills, in Halloween Color, all you need to do is painting the color with the correct numbers. You will achieve a beautiful sandbox coloring masterpiece without any skills, pencils, or paper!

👍What makes Halloween Color special?

Swift & Easy to Draw your pictures:🎨
Don't know how to draw sandbox coloring pics? Don't worry, Halloween Color-Coloring games create a new way to experience coloring without specific skills, pencils, or papers. All you need do is choosing a number and color, then tapping the shade to follow the clues.

New Designed Paintings Daily Updated: 🦋
Our designers carefully designed all the paintings in Halloween Color-Coloring games. We will provide you with tons of paint color choices and update paintings every day.

Color by Number Anytime & Anywhere:💋
Coloring books or sandbox coloring pages with simple numbers and color paint will relax your mind and calm you down. You can paint by numbers Anytime & Anywhere to relax.

Share and Post Your Paintings on Social Networks: ❤️
You can easily download your finished paintings, share them with your friends, and post them on social networks (Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, and so on).
Recommend the painting app to others and play together!

What funny things can you receive from Halloween Color-Coloring games?💐
Review your painting process by watching a short video after completing color by number! Download your color paint by numbers pic to set it as wallpaper!

Do not hesitate! Come and enjoy the wonderful Halloween trip!

descriptionHtml:
🎃Welcome to Halloween Color by Number Game! Immerse yourself in the joy of Halloween coloring with our our top-rated dark coloring app.🎨

🥳🥳Unleash your Halloween creativity! Choose your favorite images, tap the numbered color blocks on coloring page, and then watch your Halloween artwork come to life. You can also earn rewards to unlock more stunning Halloween coloring pictures, and stay tuned for exciting Halloween themed events to elevate the coloring joy! 🧹🧹

Key features:

👻 Diverse Halloween Images:
Our Halloween coloring game boasts a vast collection of Halloween-themed images, ranging from cute Halloween pumpkins and friendly ghosts to eerie haunted houses and spine-chilling creatures. Choose your favorites and paint by number with special halloween colors in coloring page.With new Halloween images added regularly, you'll never run out of spooky scenes to bring to life!

🦇 Daily Halloween Highlight:
To keep the excitement alive, we offer a special Halloween image every day. Make it a daily ritual to open the Halloween app and discover what new, spooky image awaits you to color. Complete the daily Halloween image to earn a Halloween stamp. Collect a set number of Halloween stamps to receive honors and rewards, unlocking more stunning Halloween pictures. Each day brings a new Halloween surprise and a new challenge to your creativity!

🧙Fun Halloween-themed Activities:
There are horror Halloween-themed activities that updated every week to make your coloring sessions in this Halloween coloring game more enjoyable.Engage in various fun activities designed to enhance your Halloween experience. Participate in themed challenges, special events, and contests that not only offer endless Halloween fun but also provide a chance to win exciting rewards and unlock exclusive Halloween content.

🏰 Happy Halloween with Offline Mode:
No internet? No problem! Halloween Color by Number can be enjoyed offline, so you can take your spooky coloring fun with you wherever you go. All you need do is choose the number you want to paint and color in Halloween coloring page, then tap the shade to follow the clues, happy Halloween coloring games!

🤔✨Why Choose Halloween Color by Number Game？✨🤔
-Stress Relief and Relaxation:
Coloring by number is a proven method to relieve stress and promote relaxation. Our Halloween-themed game allows you to unwind while enjoying the creative Halloween process.
-Educational and Entertaining:
Our Halloween game strikes the perfect balance between education and entertainment. Kids can learn about colors, numbers, and the Halloween theme in a fun way, making it an ideal educational tool for Halloween.
-Community and Social Sharing:
Join a vibrant community of Halloween Color by Number enthusiasts! Share your Halloween creations, participate in Halloween community challenges, and get inspired by the Halloween works of others.

🚀🚀Download Halloween Color by Number Game today and start your journey into the magical world of Halloween!!
